p: In addition to Condea verticillata, other species from the genus also afforded lignans. The compounds deoxypodophyllotoxin ( 133) and sesamin ( 134) were isolated from the flowering aerial parts of Condea tomentosa (Poit.) Harley & J.F.B.Pastore (syn. Hyptis tomentosa Poit.). The latter compound ( 134) was also obtained from Condea undulata (syn. Hyptis fasciculata) ( Falc√£o et al., 2003).
